description: The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking the professional services of a Senior SAP Training Business Process Consultant for financial process transformation, including significant business process changes resulting from changes to the Defence Resource Management Information System (DRMIS), which is a complex implementation of SAP.

full_summary:
# Announcement of Invitation to Tender
The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing an invitation to tender for the Task-Based Professional Services (TSPS) Requirement, specifically for one (1) Business Process Consultant (Senior) Level 3.

## Contract Details
The TSPS requirement is open to Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who are qualified under Tier 1 for the following category: 2.5 - Business Process Consultant (Senior). A total of [insert number] companies have been invited to submit a proposal.

### Tender Description
The DND has a requirement for one Business Process Consultant (Senior) Level 3 for financial process transformation, including significant business process changes resulting from changes to the Defence Resource Management Information System (DRMIS). The consultant will provide strategic training advice and guidance to various teams within the Department.

### Eligibility
Only companies holding a valid Supply Arrangement under E60ZT-18TSPS and qualified under Tier 1 for the above-mentioned category are eligible to submit a proposal.

### Submission Guidelines
Suppliers must submit their proposal electronically in accordance with the solicitation document. Incomplete, unsigned, or late submissions will not be considered.

### Pre-Qualification
To become a qualified Supply Arrangement Holder under E60ZT-18TSPS, companies should contact SPTS.TSPS@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA

### Delivery Location
The services required will be delivered in the National Capital Region (NCR).

### Contract Period
The contract period will be from the date of contract award to December 31, 2023, with an optional one six-month period.

### Security Requirements
The successful supplier must hold a minimum security clearance of Reliability.

### Contact Information
The contracting authority is Caleb Wallace, ADMFinProcurement-ApprovisionnementSMAFin@forces.gc.ca

Note: The Task-Based Professional Services (TSPS) Method of Supply is subject to quarterly refresh cycles. Suppliers are advised to consult the Public Services and Procurement Canada website for further information. Inquiries may be directed to SPTS.TSPS@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA.
